column3: International students (F1/M1/J1/OPT/H1) must possess a valid unexpired I-20.
Students with an F1 or M1 visa are expected to aqquire the minimum courseload for full-time students (12 credits/semester for undergraduates or 9 credits/semester for graduates.
Students with an F1/J1 visa may only work part-time (up to 20hr/wk). They must work on campus.
Students with an M1 visa are not allowed to work.
